name: Ditch the Baby
description:
Made for the Gaming Like It's 1926 Jam, this Twine is adapted from the 1926 Russian silent comedy "Love's Berries" in which a young dandy, Jean, finds himself suddenly saddled with an unwanted responsibility. All images are from the film.

The music is "Alabama Stomp" as recorded by Red & Miff's Stompers, also released in 1926.

Can you ditch the baby without filling your CAD METER? let's find out!
